entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -30.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 51 %

Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
